sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About Finoro

Finoro is a stock analysis and screening platform built with a clear vision: to simplify investing for every Indian. In a time when financial literacy is more important than ever, we aim to bridge the gap between data and decision-making.

Our platform is designed to make fundamental stock research accessible, intuitive, and insightful. Whether you're analyzing revenue growth, return on capital, or comparing valuation ratios, Finoro brings everything to your fingertips ‚Äî cleanly and without distractions.

Finoro was created by Pranav, a passionate builder at the intersection of finance and technology. Motivated by a desire to empower retail investors and simplify equity research, Pranav envisioned a platform that could bring clarity to complex financial data.

Born out of frustration with cluttered and ad-heavy tools, Finoro is designed to give you a smooth, focused, and fast experience. We combine accurate data with elegant design to help you stay informed and make better investing decisions.

Our mission is to empower retail investors with the tools they need to build wealth confidently. No noise, no fluff ‚Äî just reliable data, customizable screeners, and actionable insights.

What Sets Us Apart

  • ‚ö° Clean and fast interface tailored for Indian stock markets
  • üîç Deep screening capabilities based on financial metrics
  • üìà Visualizations to spot trends and compare stocks at a glance
  • üß† No paywall for basic analysis ‚Äî learn and explore freely

Our Vision

We envision a future where anyone ‚Äî regardless of background ‚Äî can understand businesses, evaluate opportunities, and participate in wealth creation through stock investing. Finoro is our step in that direction.

üöÄ Whether you're a student, a beginner investor, or a full-time trader ‚Äî Finoro is here to guide you. Start exploring now, and take charge of your financial journey.

); }; export default About;
